channel.title: Axolotz's Med Notes
channel.description: Recent content on Axolotz's Med Notes

item.description: Overview # Pharmokinetics is the effect of the body on drugs (i.e: what the body does to the drug). Pharmacokinetics is the study of drug absorption, distribution, metabolism, and excretion (ADME). Goal is to reach a desired beneficial effect with minimal adverse effects possible. clinician must determine the dose that most closely achieves this There is a relationship between the drug’s effect and its concentration at the active site General rule: any adverse effects that can be prevented should be prevented.
